title: What are the recent Google updates? - Quora

response.answer_text: 2 Major Changes of Google in 2019 Google recently has brought up two major changes for search results. If the first was for the Algorithm then the next was for Indexing. These both are one of the major and dominant characters which invests more in ranking a website. When we compare these two updates, the priority should be given for the Indexing. Google recently brought up on their old indexing method, were names this as “Google Mobile-First Indexing”. Although this name might sound new for some, Google’s this update was released early on by 2016. At present for resolving and finding more issues on mobile websites, Google brings this indexing method to the top of the list. This update has already started roiling or let’s just say as had started to index websites form 1st July 2019. Though this is not a new update, from now on this will be the prime aspect of indexing websites. Earlier Google websites were indexing which possessed certain guidelines put on by Google Webmaster, but by maintaining desktop guidance many websites have failed to render on Mobile and some of them not even had a proper Mobile site. For having an end to this issue, Google has planned to bring back Mobile-First Indexing. With this arrival, Google looks forward to delivering more accurate and devastating mobile sites by encouraging more users to interact with websites through their mobile. As per now, Google says that “It is expected that around 60% to 80% of people use mobile for their daily searches. But in this, almost 30% to 50% of them fail to provide a better user-friendly website. So, by bringing back this update we are looking forward to increasing this count and looking forward to bring a tough competition among the companies to provide more diverse results in their websites”.  Here the above image may give you a short idea on this. An important aspect to be noted is that Google says that this update will be affecting all new websites which are going to index in Google after 1st July. Meanwhile, it will not be affecting for old users for now. Beyond this, there is more to know about Google Mobile-First Indexing. Which is that these updates will have an impact more on new website or links which will be indexed on Webmaster. Meanwhile, there will not be a big impact on existing sites. Well, here are some simple measures which will give you a detailed understanding of What is Mobile-First Indexing. Up next when it comes to another update, by the beginning of June 2019, Google has brought up a new algorithm for the search result. Were it puts an end of ranking two sites from a single domain. This time google names this update as “Google Site Diversity Changes”. When compared with Mobile-First Indexing, there is a difference at the same has some similarities too. The slight difference is that Google indexing was an existing one and was just brought up now. And when it comes to the similarities, there are no such definable but still, both share some common characters in terms of ranking. Earlier while searching a keyword had show 4 to 5 results from the same domain and this issue brought down ranking of many websites that maintain a high DA. With the help of Site Diversity Change, Google is trying to have an end for this issue. Google Says that “We have developed Site Diversity Change’ by having a close look at ranking multiple sites from the same domain for a single keyword. As our update starts roiling you can experience more diverse search results”.  Here refer to this link for having a detailed understanding of Google Site Diversity Changes. For the past 2 decades of journey, Google has developed and delivered a wide variety of changes all fields of technology from those these two are not-so noticeable for all. But there are some who cares this a lot. Well, as this journey endures, more updates may start coming even brighter and wider than before.

While the year 2019 is rolling out so as the Google new alerts and updates to its already existing applications and software for the users, marketers and the advertisers. While in this updates the first thing that everybody noticed is the Google New alerts related to Ads, a very new publishing platform for local news, Google new alerts for the mappings, and integrating the Google Adwords Campaign with Google ads platform. Read the full article to know in details about the Google new alerts. Search News in Google The most important and surprising changes that Google brought in is for the Local writers and in the Google search news. Below you can know more about it. Google testing Mobile SERPs with ADs The Google Search Engine Ranking Page is never the same it keeps on changing, and advancements keep coming up. It was found that 14 ads one after other was present on the first page. This means the advertisements occupied the first page of the Google search engine. At the top of the page, first, four advertisements came up followed by the organic searched advertisements after that seven more paid advertisements again came up then reached six organic ads. Eventually, in the end, the research page ends with three more advertisements before the more results pop up. This means the page had a total of 14 advertisements and then eight organic results. Which means it is twice as many as the usual number of ads. While we can expect that the fact behind it is maybe Google is testing the ads in a mobile SERPs or Search Engine Ranking Page. However, it even shows that Google is pushing the company’s and making it monetized in the search results. This is an excellent sign to the digital advertisers, but not for the SEO specialist. Google’s three pack local listing This is a new type of Google local listing which you can see in Google maps. Previous it was seven pack page rollout, but now it is a three pack page roll out. Due to this, the SEO related people all are shaken to know what will be the result? And now it became a more tough task for SEO persons to optimize the Google maps for their clients. Not just that & pack where cut to 3, while previous the user was able to see the address and phone number with the name but now no address and phone number will be visible.  Google not removed the Phone number and the address it even disabled the !-click access and removed all those links which redirect to Google My Business. All the previous cards got hidden now if click on listing open page you will be redirected to the Google Map where you will find the list of 20 competitors just like the older one.  In the above image you can that first comes the paid companies, then you get a list of all the electrical companies. It is one of the best tricks that Google used because at a go you can see 20 competitors list. People will get to know about their competitors at a site on one page. Google new alert platform for Local News: Google Newspack Google went into partnership Automattic and WordPress, even invested $ 1.2 million in the new project named to be Newspack. This new NewsChannel will have a portfolio in Google as Newspack; this portfolio will have services such as the fast, secure and meager cost for the publishing news. You can even be able to post the different and small local newsroom. However, with the help of this platform, the local journalist and reporters get easy access who are struggling to bring up the local news. All those journalist and reporters who don’t understand about the Digital Marketing strategies and the business problems will all be solved now and can tell the story about the community and locality in the Google Space. Here, you don’t have to worry about the website design, building with an e-commerce system and configuring the CMSs. While if you are thinking about the aim of the Google newspack is one-platform fitting all the size of the news. However, the focus of Google is to help the small business person to raise high and succeed in the online media. Google named Newspack as “an opinionated CMS” because according to Google it is a very right thing even if publishers never did it. As per our experts, we came to know that Google will start the development process on this project soon. The platform will be available for the users after a few months. No need of Physical Presence for registering in Google My Business Recently Google introduced a new feature for the service areas in Google My Business platform. It is best for the small businesses owners without the street address, or a proper address can now share the address of local service and the other information related to business on the Google maps and search engine pages. The present GMB users can now edit all the information of the business straightly from the Dashboard of the GMB. There you can find the separate options for editing “storefront address” and “service area.” While for the businesses who have not yet registered in Google My Business and are new to it, will be guided by the Google bot through the whole setup process starts. At last, Google says that “It hopes the business will grow and better connect with the potential customers in different locations.” To know about the Google new alerts and updates follow the blog.
